page.title: 15LAW AND ORDER
page.content: P.C. Lloyd I have to do one of three shifts a day on a rota system, 6am to 2pm, 2pm to 10pm or 10pm to 6am. I have been a policeman for 22 years. We are led by our Chief Constable. My equipment consists of a truncheon, a C.B. set and a pair of handcuffs. I also carry a whistle. I have the Police Station in Clipston to live and work in have a Panda Car to visit the other villages that I am responsible for. In the boot of my car I keep all the radio equipment as well as a breathaliser kit. Normally I work just in the villages in my care unless there is an emergency elsewhere. We have recently had a new style of uniform, which I do not like. It does not have sensible pockets, and the peak cap gives me no protection at all.
